## What This PR Does

This PR adds a new CIP detail file (`shortlist/CIP-XXXX.md`) to propose this CIP for the shortlist.

**Note**: This PR only adds the detail file. Maintainers will add the CIP to `current-shortlist.md` after merge.

## Checklist

- [ ] CIP is approved in the [CIP repository](https://github.com/cardano-foundation/CIPs)
- [ ] File is named correctly (`CIP-XXXX.md`)
- [ ] File is in the `shortlist/` directory
- [ ] All required sections in the detail file are filled out
- [ ] Date format is YYYY-MM-DD
- [ ] Links are properly formatted
- [ ] Detailed explanations provided for hard fork requirement, need for new Ledger era, impact areas, and dependencies
